name: One Thousand Days
description:
This project is part of a thesis by Dhurakij Pundit University students.

One Thousand Days is a 3D adventure and survival game about getting caught on the way home in a dark and uninhabited night but there was a stranger who is looking for people who pass by this area and want to arrest them to do a religious ritual to sacrifice demons by locking them in the basement of a house.

You have to complete all of puzzle to escape this basement. 

Main Features

  • Puzzle
  • 3D viewer
  • Morse Code
  • Joystick Control
